thread.section_title: Cash4Books.net Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Cash4Books.net | www.cash4books.net
thread.title: Christopher Bennett

author: Christopher Bennett
title: Christopher Bennett
text: A little skeptical about the process, how much would they offer for these books that we typically paid a lot of money for at the time. The process was easy, it was quick and I believe it was fair. Sure, you never get your money back on these things, I have to admit I set the bar high as what I expected, and they were over that amount. I would say that if I had more text books, I would use them again. Sadly enough I do not have any more text books. I would recommend to all, to at least check out and see what they can do for you.
